<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Steel Yourself!](/Feats.aspx?ID=6355) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 205 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351)

</column>

---

You encourage an ally to toughen up, giving them a fighting chance. Choose one ally in your marshal’s aura. The ally gains [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321) equal to your Charisma modifier and a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves. Both benefits last until the start of your next turn.
name: Steel Yourself!
